about_the_game:
This DLC provides the *Hacky Zack Original Soundtrack*, in mp3 320 kbps format.

The soundtrack consists of 9 downtempo nu-jazz songs that reflect the theme of each "chapter" of the game.

Track Listing:

1) Hacky Zack
2) Introduction
3) Isolation
4) Denial
5) Self-destruction
6) Expectations
7) Manipulation
8) Acceptance
9) Conclusion

Music by Vincent Rubinetti. Album Art by Fellipe Martins

Songs can be found in the game's Steam folder:
...\Steam\steamapps\common\HackyZack\OST

name: HackyZack - Original Sountrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: indie, pixel art, spaceboy games
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: The game runs at locked 30 FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: The game runs at locked 30 FPS.
